DjVuDumpÂ¶

od verze 16 do v26 umi DJVU

od verze 27 can recognize sDJVU

#!/bin/bash
for FILE in $(ls images)
do
    OUTPUT=outputs/djvudump/$FILE.raw
    echo -e "images/$FILE \t -> $OUTPUT"
    djvudump "images/$FILE" > "$OUTPUT"
done
djvudump.raw - show djvudump.raw - hide
